body.name: Mixweer 84 Pack Flannel Cloth Baby Wipes with Dispenser Soft Natural Unbleached Baby Face Wipes Reusable Baby Wipes for Cloth Diapers, 8 x 8 Inch Each(Multicolor)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 12 hrs 32 mins
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 12 hrs 32 mins
features: Baby Wipes Set: you will receive 84 pieces flannel baby wipes in 6 different colors, 14 of each color, a quantity sufficient for your baby's daily use and replacement needs; And the wipes are equipped with 1 wipe container and 1 meshed laundry bag, bringing you more convenience

Soft and Comfortable: the baby wipes are made of quality cotton and flannel, soft and comfortable, absorbent and sturdy, so they will take care of your baby's delicate skin while proving a long service time

Reusable and Washable: these reusable baby wipes can be hand washed or machine washed, easy to clean and quick drying; And our set provides a small laundry bag for you to put them in the washing machine, saving you much cleaning time

Matching Wipe Dispenser: the flannel cloth baby wipes come with dispenser that allows you to put wipes in the dispenser to keep them clean, convenient for storing baby wipes, allowing you to quickly remove wet wipes when dealing with various urgent cleaning situations for baby

Lightweight and Portable: these baby face wipes measure about 8 x 8 inches/ 20.5 x 20.5 cm, small and lightweight, easy to carry and store; And they can be stacked for a smaller size, so you can take them with you when you are in travel
body.description: Features: The flannel cloth wipes have a small size, so you can keep one in your purse or bag, which can help you to deal with the messy situation, you can apply them to dry your hands, wipe the dribble and so on. This baby wipes dispenser can be applied as a wipes box, but also can be filled with paper towels, masks and disposable gloves. When your baby no longer need to use wipes, it will become your nice household goody. Specifications: Material: Baby wipes: cotton, flannel Wipes dispenser: PP Laundry bag: polyester Color: white, blue, green, purple, yellow and red Size: Baby wipes: 8 x 8 inches/ 20.5 x 20.5 cm Wipes dispenser: 8.8 x 4.8 x 3.7 inches/ 22.3 x 12.3 x 9.5 cm Laundry bag: 8.7 x 13 inches/ 22 x 33 cm Package includes: 84 x Baby wipes 1 x Baby wipe dispenser 1 x Laundry bag Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Loved it! Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Was very soft on little ones butt and good quality! I ended up only using one wipe for a poopy diaper and sprayed it off yesterday and instantly wiped clean. So I would say that they are pretty easy to clean! I’m not disappointed spending $40 and feel it was a great investment:)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The material is excellent and easy to wash

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for reusable baby wipes
reviews.reviewText: I soak these in my own solution and refill into my wipes warmer as needed. I can fit 30 wipes in my warmer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great, but already falling apart
reviews.reviewText: These are great, however, they are already falling apart on the seam after only a couple of washes...unfortunate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Toddler cloth napkins
reviews.reviewText: We needed at least 80 tiny cloth napkins that were actually absorbent and not polyester for our toddler class. It just wasn’t economical to buy that many cotton kids napkins and we wanted ones in a neutral color anyway. These work perfect and actually made me think maybe we could use them when I have another baby too. I never considered reusable wipes before but these seem so nice and wash really well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Containers are great
reviews.reviewText: The containers are great but the wipes don't hold water well. It has gotten better with use but definitely has been a bit of a struggle to get to that point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Poor quality. Super thin, ripped within a month.
